items.name: (2006 - 2007) U.A.D.E.R. (Universidad Autónoma de Entre Ríos)
items.description: I participated in a  migration project to GNU/Linux system on workstations, computer labs and servers at the university. I was in charge of installing and maintaining Linux systems as well as training technical and administrative personnel, network configuration, writing of documentation and user manuals (currently accessible in TLDP http://es.tldp.org/ ), installation and configuration of LAMP servers

items.name: (2007 – 2008) SILIX Soluciones Libres (http://www.silix.com.ar/)
items.description: As a founding partner of this company I've worked on diverse jobs related with IT and programming, from network installation, software configuration, backporting of software packages and website development. I worked mainly with CakePHP and PEAR for web development.

items.name: (2008 – 2015) EosWeb
items.description: As a partner in this company I'm in charge of diverse projects of software development, mainly in PHP,Javascript and MySQL. Through these years I've been incorporating new development techniques, and I have developed several websites for international companies. I also have worked with technologies such as Laravel, Magento and different database engines like MongoDB, PostgreSQL.

items.name: (2015 - 2016) Grey Suit Retail - Studio98 LLC
items.description: As of 2015 I joined Grey Suit Retail, at this company I was in charge of maintaining and upgrading a PAAS system creating
